decision_conditions: The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted, including brickwork bond shall match those used in the existing building.&nbsp; The proposed extension shall be finished with a brick on edge and tile crease detail. The completed development shall thereafter be retained in that form.&nbsp;

<p>Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the west side elevation with 39 Evelyn Drive of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.</p>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>Site Location Plan; Existing Block and Location Plans; Drawing 001 – Existing Floor Plans; ; Drawing 002 – Existing Elevations; Drawing 003 – Proposed Floor Plans;&nbsp; Drawing 004 – Proposed Elevations; Heritage Statement (received 23.09.24);&nbsp;&nbsp;Fire Safety --Reasonable Exemption Statement</p><p><br>All plans received 02.09.24 unless otherwise stated</p><div><br></div>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey rear extension; external alterations (part demolition of rear extension)
